column5: Apply for this programmeStudy the theory and practice of international and community development with our MSc Applied International Development master’s degree.This programme will develop your understanding of the theoretical frameworks needed for analysis of social change brought about by planned development interventions.Choose MSc Applied International Development at the University of ReadingYou will:
column7: New UK/Republic of Ireland students: £10,800  New international students: £22,350
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
